name: braying
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
bray
[ I ] to make the loud noise typical of a donkey (= an animal like a small horse with long ears): The mules suddenly started braying.
[ I or T ] to make a loud, unpleasant noise: They were all braying with laughter. "Come on, England!" he brayed. She had a loud, braying laugh.
